column3: was upset about not having video games and then about the mask policy. He became hostile and aggressive with students and staff. He left the room with the teacher following to make sure he would remain safe. He then started attacking staff with his fists and feet. He was placed in a small child hold until additional support AM arrived to place him in a supine.

column6: hit and bit staff again. He calmed but found out he would not have swimming. He then went after staff for over two hours. He hit
column8: kicked and punched staff. The police ended up being called AM and he was MHA'd

column3: was prompted to put his mask on because class was starting. He charged at staff
column4: hit and kicked several staff members
column5: eventually resulting in a restraint. While in the restraint
column6: one staff member got kicked in the face and one staff member got bit. He was released from the hold and he eloped outside where he remained until 10:00. In this time
column7: he fluctuated between baseline behavior and increased to agitation
column8: including physical aggression and property destruction.

column3: didn't want to leave the playground
column5: ripped up his papers then started flipping chairs and desks. He started kicking staff and went after one of his classmates. He was held in a small child AM until support could escort him to a calming area.
